content: Hello! How can I assist you today?
I want to know about getting admission in govt school

To get admission in a government school, you can use the electronic registration service provided by the Ministry of Education and Higher Education. After logging in and selecting the "electronic registration in government schools" service on the main screen, you can start the service by selecting the "Start Service" button [doc4].

To get admission in a government school, you can use the electronic transfer service provided by the Ministry of Education and Higher Education. To use this service, you need to create an account and log in to the system. After logging in, select the "electronic transfer in public schools" service on the page. Then, select the student you want to transfer and choose the school you want to transfer to. If the school has no vacancies, the system will show you alternative schools near your place. After selecting the school, you need to confirm the optional and check the availability of transportation. Finally, you need to approve the data and print the transport receipt. [doc1]
